It snowed up here in the northwest, but warmed up before anyone got
inconvenienced.  I was away for new year, but ill try to get back to a
regular posting schedule.   One of my New Year goals is to write every day.
:P

-Kraftlos (titobeau)

On Jan 12, 2011 7:54 AM, "Sandy" <magicquartz@...> wrote:

Same here, snowwed in! I have pictures on my computer, if you want to see
them I can send them to you.
